data.message: I am trying to enter the £5000 a day competition but to enter you have to visit coke.co.uk/dietcokewin when you enter this it will not let you put your lucky codes in?

replies.message: Hi Peter, apologies for the delay in getting back to you. Could you please call us on 0800 22 77 11 (option 1) so we can look into this for you? Thanks
Coca-Cola ditto - 2 letter 3 digit bottle top code doesn't work - brand new diet coke 1.75ltr only bought this morning!
Hi Karen, thanks for getting in touch. The codes should be 8 digits and can be found under the label on a promotional bottle. Hope this helps :)
